review: so well designed.  My parents have a RoKu, and I've used it a little.  And, this streaming box is way better.  I use Amazon for my MAIN media source, so that may be a big part of my decision.  They DO, have a netflix app, on this box.  And it IS, different and better, than the netflix app on my parents box.  But back to the AMAZON PRIME part.  Their app, for amazon, is laid out SO nice and organized.  It makes, the whole media library, a pleasure, and easy to get to.  And the VOICE search, is spot on, accuracy.  Not like those voice assistants on the telephone.  That understand you, sometimes.  This has NEVER missed.  Even with a mouth full of food.  NEVER MISSES.
author: Michael
